SEARCH

Package Services

package Services
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ConquestMapFileReader
    Reads a map file in Conquest format and parses it into the application's internal data structures.
    ConquestMapFileWriter
    This class is responsible for writing a game map in Conquest format to a file.
    GameService
    GameService handles saving and loading the game state (Phase object) using serialization.
    MapFileReader
    The MapFileReader class serves as a base class for reading map files.
    MapFileWriter
    The MapFileWriter class is responsible for serializing the current map state into a file format.
    MapReaderAdapter
    The MapReaderAdapter class acts as an adapter for reading map files using the ConquestMapFileReader.
    MapWriterAdapter
    The MapWriterAdapter class acts as an adapter to allow the use of ConquestMapFileWriter for writing map files in a given format.
